Title: Relates to medical evaluations of children placed in foster care
Summary: Relates to medical evaluations of children placed in foster care and providing any services deemed medically necessary for the child.
LawCode: Add ยง383-d, Soc Serv L; add ยง3620-a, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law and the public health law, in relation to the medical evaluation of children placed in foster care
